item.title: Michael Stenz
item.description:
Hi there!

I’m Michael, and I’m a computer science student from Austria! I love starting projects, and one of my biggest weaknesses is finishing one of my side projects. :)

I graduated from HTL Leonding in the branch of IT/media technologies, but my heart lies in the IT part.

For all of my personal projects, check out my GitHub and my posts here about my projects.

Linux / FOSS Meetup

I’m one of the three organizers of the Linz Linux / FOSS meetup. With our meetup that occurs every 3-4 months, we built an amazing community that I’m really proud of.
